summary: This is an email from a warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, providing the Lieutenant Rounds report for August 9-10, 2019, including which computers were used to complete rounds. It appears to be routine administrative documentation from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

persons.name: Lt. Rounds
persons.context: The email's subject line and content reference 'Lt. Rounds' as the report being provided, likely a standard security check procedure.

events.title: Lieutenant Rounds at MCC
events.description: Security rounds were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, logged from specific computers.

events.title: Lieutenant Rounds at MCC
events.description: Security rounds were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, logged from specific computers.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 11, 2019, providing Lieutenant Rounds reports for August 9-10, 2019.
It lists specific computers (279, 283, 236) used by staff to log the security rounds at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York is the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was detained and died.
The document appears to be routine administrative correspondence from the warden's office regarding facility security procedures.
The timing (August 2019) places this document in the immediate period surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
